name: Teravit
storyline:
“Rescue the TERAVIT Megami from the hands of the Demon King”
As I approached the magnificent statue of the Megami in the village, a voice echoed in my head.

“Now, what should we do?”

We climbed a small hill in the village and looked down to see a breezy, bright grassland.
There are also countless demons strutting around that stand out from this scene.
Furthermore, a sacred temple with an aura of misfortune stands rising at the end of the grassland.

If you raise your head and look around, you can see the vast ocean halfway around the horizon,
with the other half surrounded by mountain ranges.

I wondered if there would be a different view waiting for me beyond that.

After examining the grassland again and looking at the blooming flowers,
the adventurer gathered his sword and pickaxe, and took his first steps on an adventure.
summary: Teravit is an open-world sandbox RPG where you can run, fly, dig, build, and explore the voxel world in your own unique way. Adventurers explore a vast, randomly generated world with a variety of biomes and cities with different characteristics, crafting equipment and items to take on strongholds of vicious monsters to save the world from the clutches of evil. Set forth on an adventure and create your own lasting story. Explore the map in earnest, collecting items, excavating terrain with explosives, and even creating block art. The ultimate goal in this open-world is yours to decide.
